heading: Our Process
paragraphs: At Innovative Medical Wellness, we offer a streamlined process to provide exceptional care and support for your health and well-being. Our practice is the result of merging Jeffrey G. Draesel MD PA, an esteemed internal medicine practice with over 40 years of experience, and the chiropractic expertise of Jeffrey G. Draesel Jr. DC.

Led by our experienced medical professionals, including Dr. Gregory Shtender MD as our medical director, along with our board-certified nurse practitioners, we offer a comprehensive range of services from diagnostic wellness to regenerative medicine. Our process is designed to address your individual needs, including personal injury cases.
We are dedicated to supporting your overall health and well-being. Experience the difference of our innovative approach to medical care.
right_side_desc: If you or a loved one is experiencing health challenges contact us today to learn more about our services. Together, we will embark on a journey to a more vibrant future.
